snippet.title: Aggressors: Ancient Rome - Join the Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
A mix of deep gameplay and rich historical flavor, Aggressors: Ancient Rome lets you relive history as the ruler of one of the mighty civilizations of the ancient Mediterranean. Choose one of twenty available factions and conquer the world.

More info at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/783210/Aggressors_Ancient_Rome/
Join the Beta: http://www.slitherine.com/beta/cnda.asp?gid=723
Follow on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Aggressorsgame/
